$!You may need to tell DVLA if you have an acoustic neuroma.$!

%You can be fined up to £1,000 if you don’t tell DVLA about a medical condition that affects your driving. If you’re involved in an accident, you may be prosecuted.%

##Car or motorcycle licence##

You only need to tell DVLA if you suffer from disabling giddiness.

Fill in forms B1 and DIZ1 and send them to DVLA. The address is on the form.

$D
[Download ‘B1 - Confidential medical information’ (PDF, 306KB)](http://www.direct.gov.uk/prod_consum_dg/groups/dg_digitalassets/@dg/@en/@motor/documents/digitalasset/dg_066652.pdf "Download ‘B1 - Confidential medical information’ (PDF, 306KB)"){:rel="external"}
[Download ‘DIZ1 - Confidential medical information’ (PDF, 182KB)](http://www.direct.gov.uk/prod_consum_dg/groups/dg_digitalassets/@dg/@en/@motor/documents/digitalasset/dg_065610.pdf "Download ‘DIZ1 - Confidential medical information’ (PDF, 182KB)"){:rel="external"}
$D

##Bus, coach or lorry licence##

You must tell DVLA. Fill in forms B1 and DIZ1 and send them to DVLA. The address is on the form.

$D
[Download ‘B1 - Confidential medical information’ (PDF, 306KB)](http://www.direct.gov.uk/prod_consum_dg/groups/dg_digitalassets/@dg/@en/@motor/documents/digitalasset/dg_066652.pdf "Download ‘B1 - Confidential medical information’ PDF, 306KB)"){:rel="external"}
[Download ‘DIZ1 - Confidential medical information’ (PDF, 182KB)](http://www.direct.gov.uk/prod_consum_dg/groups/dg_digitalassets/@dg/@en/@motor/documents/digitalasset/dg_065610.pdf "Download ‘DIZ1 - Confidential medical information’ (PDF, 182KB)"){:rel="external"}
$D

*[DVLA]: Driver Vehicle and Licensing Agency
